thread.section_title: Colorado Pen Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Colorado Pen | www.coloradopen.com | 6 of 72
thread.title: Bob V.
thread.title_full: Colorado Pen reviewed by Bob V.

author: Bob V.
title: Bob V.
text:
I placed an order for two pens. I put a note in with my order about a specific color of ink I wanted each pen to ship with. Colorado Pen paid attention and I got what I asked for. One pen was out of stock so they shipped what was in stock and a few days later way ahead of the ETA they gave me the other pen showed up!
I've placed a few orders and they are always on top of their game. I highly recommend doing business with them.
